tool_description: Introducing our comprehensive Countries Code API, the ultimate solution for developers seeking seamless access to a vast collection of country-related information. This powerful API empowers your applications with real-time and accurate data on countries, allowing you to enhance user experiences, streamline processes, and unlock new possibilities
name: Countries code
title: Countries code

api_list.name: Get Request for Countries Code
api_list.description: A list of the world's countries with provided codes, it is beneficial to interpret the country codes in the airports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-code.p.rapidapi.com/vdHQc8/countries_code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-code.p.rapidapi.com/vdHQc8/countries_code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
